recommendations: ‚ÄúIshika worked intensively with me for her summer internship for a research project I was leading . The project involved both mind-numbing detail work and demanding 'creative problem solving'. I found that Ishika had the temperament and skills for both worlds.I found her to be someone who could work independently with little guidance and someone who could be relied on to get the job done. I am confident that with her 'zeal and skill', Ishika will be a great resource for any organization she joins. I wish her the best for a great start to her career.‚Äù Show less

‚ÄúI had the good fortune to mentor Ishika on various projects across different domains. She is very conducive to problem-solving with a knack for data-driven decision-making and was able to beautifully showcase that in the conceptualization of various high-impact projects. From technical adroitness to her forte in strategic analysis, Ishika is a complete power-pack for any team. The set of abstract traits that Ishika brings onto the table makes her a complete team player. A charming and charismatic individual, she is ever-ready to take on new responsibilities, learn cross-dimensional skills and drive all the team members towards the fulfillment of the outcome. Given all the fundoo qualities I mentioned, I am confident that folks in any organization would love to have Ishika on board in their mission. I wish her all the success in her life!‚Äù Show less
projects: [{"title":"HealthNext","start_date":"Oct 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"1. Worked on designing a digital assistant chatbot along the lines of ESI handbook to generate a medical resume to support EHR.2. Piloted in East UP‚Äôs largest hospital - IMS, BHU, HealthNext stood 4th at John Hopkins Healthcare Design Competition.3. Presently working on launching features such as- find the nearest medical official, make an appointment, personalized notifications.Exposure- Wireframes, Dashboards, SQL, REST API"},{"title":"TrashCash: Gamifying the waste throwing user experience","start_date":"Feb 2019","end_date":"Present","description":"TrashCash provides a Smart Kit which is retrofittable in any existing dustbin to make it a Smart Dustbin. Whenever a user throws garbage into one such bin, she/he gets Swacchta points in our Swacchta app, which is integrated into the Smart kit. These Swacchta points boost her/him up the community leaderboard and can also be redeemed as discount coupons at our partner stores. We at TrashCash want to bring a change in culture where people think before littering, by providing them incentives.Also, when the dustbin fills above 85%, the concerned authorities get notified through our Garbage Collector app which can then be followed to get an optimized route for lesser fuel consumption and more productivity."},{"title":"Modeling of Dust Generation in Mines","start_date":"Aug 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"1. Identified the factors contributing to the generation of dust, and the different approaches and methods to estimate it.2. Predicted the amount of dust generated in a pre-defined situation by various mathematical models for materialistic studies.3. Compared the results on various sets of parameters like accuracy, friction, etc. for an overview analysis of applicability.Exposure- Materialistic analysis, parameter optimization"}]
